name: Zap Column
tagline: Remove an unwanted column from multiple SharePoint libraries and lists.
body:
SHAREPOINT ADMINISTRATION
  • Remove a column wherever it is found throughout a site collection.
  • Remove from multiple site collections by specifying additional site parameters in the .XML file.
  • Perform simple discovery (no removal) by running only the validate portion of the script

This script is intended to be used by experienced SharePoint administrators with a good general knowledge of PowerShell. You may use or modify it at your own risk as suitable to your environment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
